content: In YAML format, create a directory of different dog breeds. For each breed, provide details such as size category (small, medium, large), lifespan, temperament, and distinctive characteristics.

Sure! Below is a YAML-formatted directory of different dog breeds, including their size category, lifespan, temperament, and distinctive characteristics.

```yaml
dog_breeds:
  - name: Labrador Retriever
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Friendly, Outgoing, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Otter-like tail, webbed feet, excellent swimming abilities

  - name: German Shepherd
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 9-13 years
    temperament: Loyal, Intelligent, Protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Versatile working dog, strong sense of smell, upright ears

  - name: Golden Retriever
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Gentle, Friendly, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Water-resistant coat, webbed feet, strong retrieving instinct

  - name: Bulldog
    size_category: Medium
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Friendly, Stubborn, Brave
    distinctive_characteristics: Stocky build, wrinkled face, distinctive pushed-in nose

  - name: Poodle
    size_category: Small to Large (Standard, Miniature, Toy)
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Intelligent, Active, Energetic
    distinctive_characteristics: Hypoallergenic coat, various sizes, curly or corded毛发

  - name: Beagle
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Curious, Friendly
    distinctive_characteristics: Excellent sense of smell, strong hunting instincts, pack-oriented

  - name: Siberian Husky
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Outgoing, Adventurous, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, blue or multi-colored eyes, strong pulling abilities

  - name: Dachshund
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Courageous, Loyal, Independent
    distinctive_characteristics: Long body and short legs, strong digging abilities, various coat types

  - name: French Bulldog
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Playful, Easygoing
    distinctive_characteristics: Bat-like ears, compact build, wrinkled face

  - name: Rottweiler
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Loyal, Confident, Protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Strong build, black and tan coat, historically used for herding and pulling loads

  - name: Boxer
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Energetic, Loyal, Playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Square muzzle, muscular build, known for their playful "play bow" stance

  - name: Shih Tzu
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 10-16 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Loyal, Spunky
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, flowing coat, expressive eyes, lion-like appearance

  - name: Yorkshire Terrier
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Courageous, Alert, Friendly
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, silky coat, small size, big personality

  - name: Doberman Pinscher
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 10-13 years
    temperament: Loyal, Intelligent, Energetic
    distinctive_characteristics: Smooth coat, erect ears, powerful build

  - name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 9-14 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Gentle, Friendly
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, silky ears, friendly disposition, comes in various colors

  - name: Australian Cattle Dog
    size_category: Medium
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Energetic, Intelligent, Loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Robust build, blue or red coat with mottling or speckling, high herding instincts

  - name: Chihuahua
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-20 years
    temperament: Loyal, Alert, Sassy
    distinctive_characteristics: Tiny size, large eyes, various coat types and colors

  - name: Pomeranian
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Energetic, Curious, Playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, fox-like appearance, small size

  - name: Basset Hound
    size_category: Medium
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Calm, Affectionate, Placid
    distinctive_characteristics: Short legs, long ears, excellent sense of smell

  - name: Great Dane
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 6-8 years
    temperament: Gentle, Friendly, Affectionate
    distinctive_characteristics: Giant size, muscular build, often referred to as "gentle giants"

  - name: West Highland White Terrier
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Bold, Alert, Friendly
    distinctive_characteristics: White double coat, sturdy build, perky ears

  - name: Bernese Mountain Dog
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 6-8 years
    temperament:稳重, 友好, 忠诚
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick, tri-colored coat, strong build, historically used for drafting and herding

  - name: Miniature Schnauzer
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Intelligent, Alert, Playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Wirehaired coat, rectangular build, bushy eyebrows and beard

  - name: Shetland Sheepdog
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Intelligent, Energetic, Devoted
    distinctive_characteristics: Collie-like appearance, herding instincts, double coat

  - name: American Staffordshire Terrier
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Loyal, Confident, Stubborn
    distinctive_characteristics: Strong build, broad head, muscular body

  - name: Pug
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Playful, Affectionate, Clownish
    distinctive_characteristics: Wrinkled face, curly tail, compact build

  - name: Rhodesian Ridgeback
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Loyal, Intelligent, Independent
    distinctive_characteristics: Ridge of hair along the back, strong hunting instincts, sleek coat

  - name: Siberian Husky
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Outgoing, Adventurous, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, blue or multi-colored eyes, strong pulling abilities

  - name: Dalmatian
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 11-13 years
    temperament: Energetic, Loyal, Friendly
    distinctive_characteristics: Spotted coat, strong sense of hearing, historically used as coach dogs

  - name: Maltese
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Playful, Affectionate, Gentle
    distinctive_characteristics: Pure white, silky coat, small size, hypoallergenic

  - name: Corgi (Cardigan Welsh Corgi and Pembroke Welsh Corgi)
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Energetic, Friendly, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Short legs, long body, strong herding instincts, different tail lengths between varieties

  - name: Boston Terrier
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 11-15 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Intelligent, Energetic
    distinctive_characteristics: Brachycephalic head, tuxedo-like appearance, compact build

  - name: Bull Terrier
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Energetic, Stubborn, Playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Egg-shaped head, muscular build, white or colored coat

  - name: Afghan Hound
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Independent, Graceful, Reserved
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, fine coat, aloof demeanor, swift and agile

  - name: Boxer
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Energetic, Loyal, Playful
    distinctive_characteristics: Square muzzle, muscular build, known for their playful "play bow" stance

  - name: Samoyed
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Friendly, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick, white double coat, smiling expression, historically used for herding and sledding

  - name: Irish Setter
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Energetic, Friendly, Loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Rich red coat, floppy ears, strong hunting instincts

  - name: Vizsla
    size_category: Medium
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Loyal, Energetic, Sensitive
    distinctive_characteristics: Short, copper-colored coat, excellent hunting companion, affectionate with family

  - name: Alaskan Malamute
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Intelligent, Strong-Willed
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, powerful build, wolf-like appearance

  - name: Border Collie
    size_category: Medium
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Intelligent, Energetic, Loyal
    distinctive_characteristics: Versatile working dog, strong herding instincts, various coat types

  - name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 9-14 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Gentle, Friendly
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, silky ears, friendly disposition, comes in various colors

  - name: Chihuahua
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-20 years
    temperament: Loyal, Alert, Sassy
    distinctive_characteristics: Tiny size, large eyes, various coat types and colors

  - name: Dachshund
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Courageous, Loyal, Independent
    distinctive_characteristics: Long body and short legs, strong digging abilities, various coat types

  - name: Doberman Pinscher
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 10-13 years
    temperament: Loyal, Intelligent, Energetic
    distinctive_characteristics: Smooth coat, erect ears, powerful build

  - name: French Bulldog
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Playful, Easygoing
    distinctive_characteristics: Bat-like ears, compact build, wrinkled face

  - name: German Shepherd
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 9-13 years
    temperament: Loyal, Intelligent, Protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Versatile working dog, strong sense of smell, upright ears

  - name: Golden Retriever
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Gentle, Friendly, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Water-resistant coat, webbed feet, strong retrieving instinct

  - name: Great Dane
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 6-8 years
    temperament: Gentle, Friendly, Affectionate
    distinctive_characteristics: Giant size, muscular build, often referred to as "gentle giants"

  - name: Havanese
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 14-16 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Playful, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Curly, hypoallergenic coat, friendly disposition, adaptable

  - name: Labrador Retriever
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 10-12 years
    temperament: Friendly, Outgoing, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Otter-like tail, webbed feet, excellent swimming abilities

  - name: Poodle (Standard, Miniature, Toy)
    size_category: Small to Large
    lifespan: 12-15 years
    temperament: Intelligent, Active, Energetic
    distinctive_characteristics: Hypoallergenic coat, various sizes, curly or corded毛发

  - name: Rottweiler
    size_category: Large
    lifespan: 8-10 years
    temperament: Loyal, Confident, Protective
    distinctive_characteristics: Strong build, black and tan coat, historically used for herding and pulling loads

  - name: Shih Tzu
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 10-16 years
    temperament: Affectionate, Loyal, Spunky
    distinctive_characteristics: Long, flowing coat, expressive eyes, lion-like appearance

  - name: Siberian Husky
    size_category: Medium to Large
    lifespan: 12-14 years
    temperament: Outgoing, Adventurous, Intelligent
    distinctive_characteristics: Thick double coat, blue or multi-colored eyes, strong pulling abilities

  - name: West Highland White Terrier
    size_category: Small
    lifespan: 12-16 years
    temperament: Bold, Alert, Friendly
    distinctive_characteristics: White double coat, sturdy build, perky ears
```

This list includes a variety of popular dog breeds, each with their own unique characteristics and traits. Whether you're looking for a small, affectionate companion or a large, energetic working dog, there's a breed out there for every lifestyle and preference.
